title: Add a metrics monitoring service
text: With multicontainer applications, it's easy to add new services. This tutorial explains how to set up an InfluxData monitoring service for your containers.

title: Project Fin: coming soon
text: Project Fin is an industrial-strength carrier board for the Raspberry Pi Compute Module 3 Lite. Available from resin.io later this spring.

title: Open source updates
text: Resin.io is committed to providing an open source version of our core product. Learn more about what we've accomplished so far and the steps we're taking to make this happen.

title: Raspberry Pi 3 Model B+ support
